message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for it. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand that $200 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $175.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $175 is still a bit more than I can afford.  How about we split the difference and I'll pay $162.50?
I understand that $162.50 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $165.
